record.title: AUTHORIZING TRANSFERS FROM SENATE GIFT SHOP REVOLVING FUND

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's table the Senate bill (S. 1537) to authorize the transfer of certain funds from the Senate Gift Shop Revolving Fund to the Senate Employee Child Care Center, and ask for its immediate consideration in the House.

record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the Senate bill.
record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Pennsylvania?
record.narrative: The Clerk read the Senate bill, as follows:
